name: Uber
desc: Uber connects riders with safe, reliable, convenient transportation providers at a variety of price-points in cities around the world.

values.profile: Access the basic profile information on a user's Uber account including their first name, email address, and profile picture.
values.history: Pull trip data including the locations, times, and product type of a user's historical pickups and drop-offs.
values.history_lite: Same as history but without city information.
values.request: Make requests for Uber Products on behalf of users.
values.request_receipt: Get receipt details for Requests made by application.
